document_data.mainbody:
Dragonfire was an expensive sherry exported from the city of Zazesspur in Tethyr.
The alcoholic beverage had a distinctly deep amber color.
As of the late 14, Dragonfire sherry could be found in Zazesspur as well as in Morgans Inn â€“ a large tavern and inn located in the city of Velen. The drink was sold for four silver pieces per bottle. Volothamp Geddarm mentioned the libation in his guide to the Lands of Intrigue as "being worth every coin."
